thread.title: Music release of hindi film, 'Love Exchange' launched in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Music release of hindi film, 'Love Exchange' launched in Mumbai - Entertainment

author: Special featues
title: Music release of hindi film, 'Love Exchange' launched in Mumbai
text:
The music release of Hindi film, Love Exchange was held at a suburban theatre amid fanfare. While director  Raj V Shetty enthralled the audiences with his witty one liners, music director Jaidev Kumar and lyricist Kumaar shared personal experiences.
Producer Nadia Ali Shirazi was all praise for her music director and is positive about the film turning into a big hit. Other guests who attended the musical evening of this upcoming romantic comedy include the filmâ€™s lead pair, Mohit Madan and Jyoti Sharma, singers Javad Bashir, Dev Negi, Simerjit and producer, Girish Wankhede.

Nadia Ali Shirazi, Jyoti Sharma, Mohit Madan, Raj. V. Shetty; (inset) Girish Wankhede
